text: Nicholas Flamel ( 1330 â€“ 22 March 1418)According to Nigel Wilkins: Nicolas Flamel, des livres et de l'or, Chapter 1: De Paris. was a Medieval French Scribe, Scrivener and bookseller and alchemist. There are legends about him finding the Philosopher's Stone and becoming immortal. == In Popular Culture == Flamel is a minor character in Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone and an important character in The Secrets of the Immortal Nicholas Flamel. == References == Category:1330s births Category:1410s deaths Category:Alchemy Category:Longevity claims
title: Nicholas Flamel
